pages.text: I assume that this charm base is the main ingredient to make a charm.$(br) There are some of these lying around in the carving room but most of them are broken, I think these are very fragile. $(o)Are charms also that fragile?$()$(br) Also, there is something written on the edge of a charm base I found in the room: "Death Causes Destruction"$(br2) Broken ones can be repaired with tuff.
